description: Episode of Series "For the juniors". This educational video explains the dry weather and its characteristics. It explains humidity and the effects dry weather has on farms and nature. The video talks of drought and how animals can adapt to periods of dry weather and also the effects of water wastage and conservation. Koalas and camels feature.
